w :  come to the movies with us .  everybody needs to take a break every once in a while .
m :  i guess i might as well .  i ' ve been studying so long i can hardly concentrate .

question: what does the man mean ?
choice: he might go to the movies when he finishes studying .
he doesn ' t know if he concentrates on a movie .
he needs to stop studying for a while .
answer: he needs to stop studying for a while .
